name: Legion of Super Heroes: White Witch Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: When the Legion first met the White Witch, her appearance had been drastically altered and she was going by a different name.  What name was she going by?
questions.explanation:
Hag.

	The White Witch's mind and body had been transformed by Mordru into an old, ugly woman who had become part of the Devil's Dozen, a group fighting the Legion.  Her mind and body were restored during her initial encounter with the Legion.

questions.text: The White Witch was introduced in 'Adventure Comics' #350 in 1966.  What is her home planet?
questions.explanation:
Naltor.

	Unlike the other inhabitants of her home world, she was born without any precognitive abilities.  The people of her world considered her "blind" and they shunned her.

questions.text: What is the White Witches's real name?
questions.explanation:
Mysa Nal.

	Mysa is the youngest daughter of the High Seer of Naltor.  She is also the younger sister to the Legion member known as Dream Girl.

questions.text: In her youth, after her mother died, the White Witch opted to leave Naltor and live elsewhere.  Where did she reside?
questions.explanation:
Zerox.

	Mysa left Naltor, where she was outcast.  She went to Zerox, the Sorcerer's World.  She excelled in study of mystical arts, and in time became regarded as one of the planet's strongest sorcerers.

questions.text: After appearing in two Legion adventures, it would be fourteen years (1982) before she appeared again.  At this next meeting, her physical appearance had transformed.  Which of the following was NOT one the alterations.
questions.correct: She had developed a white tail
options: Her previously red hair was now white
She had developed a white tail
She had antenna that extended out from the outsides of her eyes
questions.explanation:
She had developed a white tail.

	In addition to the alterations noted, her skin was now almost completely chalk white.  These alterations were the result of her continued studies into the mystical arts.

questions.text: In the "5 Year Later" continuity, readers discover that the White Witch entered into marriage during the five year gap.  Who is her husband?
questions.explanation:
Mordru.

	Mordru the Merciless had supposedly been reformed.  After marrying him, Mysa is subjected to mystical imprisonment and loses her powers until rescued by the Legion.

questions.text: Near the end of the "5 Year Later" continuity, White Witch is de-aged by Glorith back to being a teenager.  What new code name does she assume?
questions.explanation:
Jewel.

	Mysa assumed this code name when she and her fellow Legionnaires had to assume disguises and go underground after they were accused of treason.

questions.text: In the "Post Zero Hour/Reboot" continuity, the White Witch is the daughter of Mordru.  She is a major contributing force behind the origin of what future Legion member?
questions.explanation:
Kinetix.

	In this continuity White Witch is never a Legion member.  She spends over 100 years planting the seeds for Kinetix to gain her powers.  White Witch hopes that Kinetix will be powerful enough to help her defeat her father, Mordru.

questions.text: In the "retroboot" continuity, White Witch is forced to use one of Mordru's own spells against him and steal his magic.  After doing so, her appearance is again altered, and she uses what new code name?
questions.explanation:
Black Witch.

	Her hair and costume becoming all black, Mysa works to control the magic she has stolen.  She stays with the Legion for a bit, but then chooses to return to the Sorcerer's World.

questions.text: After leaving the Legion and returning to the Sorcerer's World, the White Witch professes her love for what fellow Legionnaire?
questions.explanation:
Blok.

	As Black Witch, Mysa professes her love to/for Blok. When they touch, his body is healed from recent injuries and Mysa is able to more easily control the dark magics she has absorbed from Mordru.
